subject: RE: [junit] junit testing with servlets
msgSnippet: ... I guess my advertising was premature. :) We hope to put copies in your Christmas stockings. Take care. J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software
messageBody:
>So said Chip Dunning on 2003-05-22 --------------------
>Any idea when it is coming out - Amazon doesn't show it at all and
>searching for JUnit on bn.com just brings up a bunch of books by Marquis
>De Sade and other "technical" writers and the terrible Java Tools for
>eXtreme Programming.

I guess my advertising was premature. :) We hope to put copies in your Christmas stockings.

Take care.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
